# Dumb Example

of generic HTML widgets interacting using crosstalk.

```{r}
library(crosstalk)
library(uiwidgets)
library(htmltools)

# only used right now to get a crosstalk group...
s = SharedData$new(data.frame(key=paste(1:10)), key=~key)

slider = widget("transmitter", "<input type='range' min='1' max='10'/>", crosstalk=s, width=200)
box = widget(s, "receiver", "<input type='textarea' style='height:200px;font-size:14pt;'/>", height=400, width=400)
span = widget(s, "receiver", "<span style='font-size:14pt;'/>", value="innerText", width=200, data=letters[1:10])

p1 = tags$div(list(tags$h3("HTML range slider"), slider))
p2 = tags$div(list(tags$h3("the raw slider values in a text box"), box))
p3 = tags$div(list(tags$h3("an HTML SPAN element with looked up values from the slider:"), span))

bscols(p1, p2, p3, widths=c(3,6,3))
```
